text: Christian Eckert (born 8 February 1956 in Algrange, Moselle) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Meurthe-et- Moselle department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Algrange Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:French Ministers of Budget Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Christian Eckert
